Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Mission of Step Up
              
              Book is generally quite boring. It is very difficult for learners to master the knowledge by reading books only. Because books are often written by good learners for good learners to learn. Step Up would like to change this matter. We would like to help average person to be inspired and can obtain the knowledge in a comfortable and effective way. We pursue the best learning technology, present the contents through attractive p
              

              *What you do:
              
              - Research market, customers
              
              - Create ideas & format for the book
              
              - Prepare action plan
              
              - Search & manage sources to implement the project ( including Vietnamese & foreigners)
              
              - Control quality and costs
              
              - Complete the project
              
              A book that often consists of the knowledge, stories, pictures, illustration,  design and attached app.

Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              *What we expect from you:
              
              - Have experience in teaching English
              
              - Love English and enjoy researching about teaching methodology
              
              - IELTS from 7.5 onwards
              
              - Creative, proactive, dedicated
              
              - Possess good project management skills
              


              * Why Step Up?
              
              - Attractive salary from 12-20 million dongs
              
              - Free lunch & 5 working days per week
              
              - Interesting job that give you chances to improve a lot of skills such as researching, project (quality & cost) management & team management
              
              - A very open and dynamic working environment where you are always encouraged to show the best of yourself
              

              Don't wait. Apply and get this great opportunity.
